header: this is a bit mixed edition. Ruth collected the articles, but I am (Gabor) picked the title and writing the intro as well.

I also must apologize for the delay in sending out this edition but I was on a flight from Sofia to Tel Aviv apparently due to a 'navigation error' we first flew over Belgrade and then to Budapest. Then it took 2 hours to get on another plane and 3 more hours to Tel Aviv. Basically our pilot got lost in the cloud.
I think I should look for some cloud and Perl-related articles and to write a few myself.
subject: Lost in the cloud
